abstract.t: This proposal specifies a Kerberos (RFC 1510 [3]) change/set passwordprotocol and a Kerberos change/set key protocol. The protocolconsists of a single request and reply message. The request messageincludes both AP-REQ and KRB-PRIV submessages; the new password iscontained in the KRB-PRIV submessage which is encrypted in thesubsession key from the AP-REQ.
